sentences.en: A cabaret is a restaurant providing food, drink, and often a floor show.
sentences.cn: “卡巴莱”夜总会是一种供应食物 、 饮料并经常有歌舞表演的餐厅.

sentences.en: A weekly cabaret was conjured up.
sentences.cn: 每星期举行一次即兴的歌舞表演.

sentences.en: Be responsible for a cabaret aa work.
He was just starting to become known on the cabaret circuit.
sentences.cn: 他在卡巴莱歌舞表演圈中刚刚开始有点名气。

sentences.en: Helen made a successful career in cabaret.
sentences.cn: 海伦在卡巴莱歌舞表演上非常成功。

sentences.en: Now, he developed a new solo act , playing the cabaret circuit.
sentences.cn: 这时, 他发展了一种新的单人滑稽剧,在几个卡巴莱作轮回演出.

sentences.en: Peter and I also did a cabaret at the Corn Exchange.
sentences.cn: 我和彼得也在CornExchange剧院上演了喜剧表演。

sentences.en: She has a regular cabaret spot at a local night - club.
sentences.cn: 她在当地一家夜总会有她固定的歌舞节目档.

sentences.en: Simon Cabaret the most exciting place to be on the Andaman Gulf.
sentences.cn: 西蒙余兴节目最扣人心弦的地方是在安达曼海湾.

sentences.en: That nightclub has a good reputation for its cabaret.
sentences.cn: 那家夜总会的歌舞表演十分有名.

sentences.en: The cabaret is right on the street corner.
sentences.cn: 那家歌舞餐厅就在街角.

sentences.en: The cabaret was the high spot of the evening.
sentences.cn: 有歌舞表演的餐馆是晚上最引人入胜的地方.

sentences.en: The cabaret's side and opposite have tickets to sell.
sentences.cn: 旁边以及对面的酒店都有售票.

sentences.en: The city has two nightclubs with cabaret.
sentences.cn: 这个城市有两家有歌舞表演的夜总会.

sentences.en: The empress of the cabaret breakfast send to exhibition building exhibition.
sentences.cn: 酒店早餐后,送往展馆布展.中午盒饭.展后前往中餐馆就餐.

trans.tran_cn: 卡巴莱餐馆，卡巴莱歌舞表演
trans.tran_en: entertainment, usually with music, songs, and dancing, performed in a restaurant or club while the customers eat and drink
